dc:title: More About Cuba
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Rues the nationalism and waste of resources that continues in our relations with Cuba--"out next door brothers." Says she will continue to write in the light of faith about all that contributes to "a heartwarming zeal for the common good." Keywords: war, pacifism
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 800 1963-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
